itemDescription: British Olympic gold medallist in sailing

wikipedia_page.main: David Bond (27 March 1922 – 23 March 2013) was a British Olympic gold medallist in sailing. He competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics in London and won a gold medal in the Swallow class with Stewart Morris. He was involved in the promotion of elements related to the 2012 Summer Olympics and was the last surviving British gold medallist from the 1948 Games.
